data.name: DescriptionPageTextStep1Description1
data.value: No need to input personal information. We are using unique ID, allocated to you when installing an app.
data.comment: How it works page step 1 description 1

data.name: DescriptionPageTextStep2Description1
data.value: A contact with another app user for longer than 30 min in total, within a radius closer than 2m on average is recorded as "Close Contact".
data.comment: How it works page step 2 description 1

data.name: DescriptionPageTextStep4Description
data.value: Bluetooth needs to be turned on to record close contact. Please go to the next page to turn it on.
data.comment: How it works page step 4 description

data.name: StartTutorialPageTextProtectingOurLovedOnes
data.value: Protecting our loved ones from COVID-19

data.name: DescriptionPageTitleTextStep1
data.comment: How it works page step 1 title

data.name: DescriptionPageTitleTextStep2
data.comment: How it works page step 2 title

data.name: DescriptionPageTitleTextStep3
data.value: If you are diagnosed COVID-19 positive
data.comment: How it works page step 3 title

data.name: DescriptionPageTitleTextStep4
data.comment: How it works page step 4 title

data.name: DialogNetworkConnectionError
data.comment: Dialog message for Network connection error

data.name: InitSettingPageTextExposureNotificationDescription
data.value: This app uses Exposure Notification / Bluetooth signals to determine if you are near another contact tracing app user. Select 'Always Allow' to set up Bluetooth.
data.comment: Device access page Allow Exposure Notification / Bluetooth description

data.name: InitSettingPageTextExposureNotification
data.comment: Device access page Allow Exposure Notification / Bluetooth title

data.name: ExposuresPageNoExposuresInfo
data.value: You will be notified if you have been exposed to someone who reported a positive COVID-19 result.

data.name: SharePositiveDiagDateText
data.value: The test date helps the app know when you may have been contagious and notify the right people of potential exposure.

data.name: SharePositiveEntryCodeText
data.value: Only those who have been exposed will receive a notification.

data.name: SharePositiveEntryCodeText2
data.value: The unique test identifier that came with your COVID-19 test must be used to verify your positive test result.

data.name: NotifyOtherPageDialogENDisabledText
data.value: Please enable Exposure Notifications before submitting a diagnosis.

data.name: SharePositiveDiagnosisPageVerifyFailedDialogText
data.value: Your diagnosis cannot be verified at this time to be submitted.

data.name: InitSettingPageDialogExposureNotificationTitle
data.value: Do you want to turn on notifications?

data.name: HomePageHeader2Title
data.value: If you received a positive diagnosis

data.name: ButtonNotifyOtherPage
data.value: Sharing positive information and anonymous notification to others

data.name: SettingsPageDialogResetText
data.value: Do you really want to reset all the data?

data.name: SettingsPageDialogResetCompletedText
data.value: All settings and data have been deleted. Please restart the application.

data.name: CloseContactNotificationDescription
data.value: Application notifications at the time of close contact

data.name: NotifyOtherPageDialogInvalidDiagnosisIDText
data.value: Please provide a valid Diagnosis ID

data.name: NotifyOtherPageDialogInvalidTestDateText
data.value: Please provide a valid Test Date

data.name: PositiveRegistrationConfirmText
data.value: Would you like to register positively later?

data.name: DescriptionPageTextStep1Description2
data.value: When you run the application , it will generate and store an anonymous ID on each smartphone. This application does not acquire any information related to privacy such as phone number and location information.
data.comment: How it works page step 1 description 2

data.name: DescriptionPageTextStep2Description2
data.value: While the application is running, each other's smartphone will record each other's anonymous IDs for the past two weeks. Records older than 2 weeks will be deleted and each anonymous ID will be changed periodically to protect privacy.
data.comment: How it works page step 2 description 2

data.name: DescriptionPageTextStep3Description1
data.value: Other users regularly get a list of anonymous IDs of positive ones. After the acquisition, the contact record recorded on the smartphone will be matched. If the result of the match is a heavy contact, we will notify your smartphone and inform you of the necessary actions that you would like us to cooperate with.
data.comment: How it works page step 3 description

data.name: HomePageHeader1Title
data.value: Contact with positive testers in the last 14 days

data.name: HomePageHeader2Description
data.value: If you are positive with the new Corona, please cooperate with the positive registration to protect the people around you.

data.name: HomePageHeader3Description
data.value: This application is so effective that many people install it, so please share the application with people around you.
